explains: v. 翱翔，盘旋；徘徊，守候；处于不稳定状态；上下波动，左右摇摆；伏窝孵化

sentences.en: Seagulls hover over the surging waves.
sentences.cn: 海鸥在惊涛骇浪上翱翔。

sentences.en: No one really knows how many different faces someone can recall, for example, but various estimates tend to hover in the thousands—based on the number of acquaintances a person might have.
sentences.cn: 例如，没有人真正知道一个人能回忆起多少张不同的面孔，但各种各样的估计往往会在1000个左右徘徊——基于一个人可能认识的熟人数量。

sentences.en: If you hover over the icon or space to the right of the label, you will not see the disabled cursor style.
sentences.cn: 如果将鼠标悬浮于图标或该标签右侧的空白处，将看不到这个禁用了的光标样式。
